# isVideoMinFrameDurationSupported

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the connection supports a minimum frame duration.

## Declaration

```swift
var isVideoMinFrameDurationSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The property indicates whether the connection honors the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureConnection/videoMinFrameDuration] property for a video connection.

## Configuring a video’s frame rate

- **videoMinFrameDuration**: The smallest time interval the connection can apply between consecutive video frames.
- **isVideoMaxFrameDurationSupported**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the connection supports a maximum frame duration.
- **videoMaxFrameDuration**: The largest time interval the connection can apply between consecutive video frames.
